#summary A list of available plugins

||adaptVisibleRangeForPixelSize||Plugin to set the limits for the size manually||
||averageDensity||Otsu thresholding and average density calculation||
||Box_Zoom||Allows the user to zoom into a region specified with a box. Double-click on the border to accept the zoom-box.||
||Cluster_DBSCAN||Opens the GUI to perform DBSCAN clustering. See the corresponding documentation for details.||
||density_column||Adds a new variable corresponding to the density at each localization, measured from the last density-based rendering.||
||density_plot||Performs a density plot around a specified position, across the spread of the point distribution.||
||double_Gaussian_fit||Perform a double Gaussian fit and plot the results||
||Drift_correction_fiducial||Opens the GUI to perform drift correction with fiducials. See corresponding documentation for details.||
||Drift_correction_xCor||Opens the GUI to perform drift correction with cross-correlation. See the corresponding documentation for details.||
||generic_command||Opens a mini-prompt to perform a generic MATLAB command||
||hello_message||Simplest possible plugin example.||
||meanDensity||nction meanDensity(handles)||
||plot3D||Creates a new 3D scatterplot of the data||
||pspectrum||Power spectrum of the current rendering||
||Render_3DVol||Opens the GUI for the 3D iso-surface rendering plugin. See corresponding documentation for details.||
||toNanometers||Converts the XYZ data from generic units to nanometers.||
||Transform3D||nction varargout = Transform3D(varargin)||
||vol3D||Creates a 3D volume from the data. Please use the Render_3DVol plugin.||
